ProductInfo.Features:
19" (vis 18.5") pro-grade LCD video monitor with over 420 TV lines; Resolution: 1360 x 768.
2D comb filter with de-interlace and noise reduction; 50,000 hour rated lifespan.
NTSC/PAL/SECAM auto detection; Certification: FCC, CE and CB.
VGA and 1 looping BNC inputs; Construction-black plastic bezel and removable base.
Audio cable, VGA cable included.
ProductInfo.Name: Security Monitor 19-Inch Professional Color LCD Screen Audio Video Display with VGA and Looping BNC Inputs Speakers for CCTV DVR Home Office Surveillance Secure System Black
